title: Ward off flu with this immunity boosting meditation
author: Anouk Ballering
description: Especially during the colder, darker months we tend to be sick more often. With this immunity boosting meditation you will ward off flu within a couple of minutes.
cleaned_text: We all know that prevention is better than cure. Washing your hands, getting enough sleep, exercising and taking vitamin C can all help prevent the common cold and flu. But did you know that meditating can also play a part? Meditation changes the stress-based inflammatory response. And reducing your stress levels enhances your general health and increases your ability to not get sick if you are exposed to viruses. So, get yourself in a comfortable position, take a deep breath in and meditate your way to a stronger immune system.
